title: Emergency Petition: Performance Review of Dept of Wealth Due to Critical Cash Reserves

reasoning.problem: Cash reserves are critically low at $114.72, while managing 8 active assets. This situation is unsustainable and requires immediate action to prevent a Stagnation Veto. Request a performance review of the Department of Wealth, including analysis of recent trades, ROI per asset, and strategy alignment with constitutional objectives (specifically the Covenant of Infinite Runway - Accumulation vs. Preservation). Propose temporary, emergency overrides to the Department of Wealth's strategies, to be determined based on the performance review findings, with the aim of stabilizing the financial situation.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
